price: Déjalos que coman, que disfruten y sean seducidos por el apego a esta vida mundanal, que ya sabrán.
arabic: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُواْ وَيَتَمَتَّعُواْ وَيُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: dharhum yakulū wayatamattaʿū wayul'hihimu al-amalu fasawfa yaʿlamūna
